ch.aplu.raspisim

Class Shadow

  • java.lang.Object
    • Actor
      • ch.aplu.raspisim.Shadow

  • public class Shadow
extends Actor
    Class to represent a rectangle shadow area where light from torches is absorbed.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Shadow(Location upperLeft, Location lowerRight)
      Creates a rectangular shadow area.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Location getCenter()
      Returns the center of the rectangular area
      boolean inShadow(Location target)
      Tests if the given target location is in the shadow area.

    • Method Detail

      • getCenter

        public Location getCenter()
        Returns the center of the rectangular area
        Returns:
        the center of the shadow

      • inShadow

        public boolean inShadow(Location target)
        Tests if the given target location is in the shadow area.
        Parameters:
        target - the target location to check
        Returns:
        true, if the target is inside the shadow area
